message.body: Did you already get mom a gift?
I was thinking we could both get her a new digital camera for Christmas if you're interested.
We could do that. We need to decide fast for shipping time. Check out this camera:
Did you look at that camera link? We have to decide today to get it here in time.
yeah i did. And then i started looking at the reviews seems good for mom. Should we pick blue or silver? I can write you a check if you're ab
I was also thinking blue or silver. How about blue? I can order it.
Ok great, thanks for ordering it! Have fun in Vermont :)
I'm on the bus heading there now.
I was telling mom about richard and my plans for the holidays and hes going to be over for that weekend before xmas. Longwood should be great
. I know we should pick a time soon do ill find out from Richard how long he'll be staying for.
Hurry up and figure it out.
